title: cant connect to loading screen.
body: not sure whats going on, i played a game and after that game went to play another thats when the problem came, not sure whats happend. i have checked my connection and repaired game. now i have a 5 game match ban with 20min wait.. can anyone help?

replies.body:
Most of the time this issue is caused by your connection dropping off before hitting the game server. I strongly encourage you to work through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
